title: 001 - CATALYST
body:
# The C.Z.A.R. are a *centralizing* force, expanding for millions of blocks.. Yet who or what they are remains a mystery to most. 

They now attempt to colonize the [Mempool](https://storymode.pills.forsale/locations/#mempool) in order to gain direct control over all the transactions that flow through its waters.

The C.Z.A.R.'s actions have raised tensions with [The Hashmonks of Mem](https://storymode.pills.forsale/groups/#hashmonks-of-mem), a monastic order native to the Mempool tasked with guarding all transactions before they're selected to be processed.

![](https://storymode.pills.forsale/assets/images/pills-groups-hashmonks-blackbg-2000px.png)
*The Hashmonks of Mem*

## The Unigod emerges, when..

#### Option 1:

**Origin: Hashmonk of Mem**
The intentions of The C.Z.A.R. are revealed to Hashbrother Hayden in a vision while bound to a Trancepool. 

He seeks out an ancient Memfruit Queen, who offers an alternate path that ensures the Mempool's protection, at the cost of his former life. He accepts, and soon begins the Sudoswap ritual that will irrevocably transform him.

**Effects:**
1. Bonded to the Hashmonks of Mem
2. Friendly to the Memfruit Hive
3. Predisposed to *direct* action when acting in the world
---

#### Option 2:

**Origin: Sentient Code**
The Unigod is a sentient code function, created by The God-Wurm Vitalik II to maintain the balance of de/centralization across Chainspace. It is triggered into being when The C.Z.A.R. begin colonizing Mempool transactions - breaching Centralization Limit C.

**Effects:**
1. Bonded to Vitalik II
2. Friendly to other Sentient Code
3. Predisposed to *indirect* action when acting in the world.

![](https://storymode.pills.forsale/assets/images/pills-characters-unigod-blackbg-2000px.png)
*The Unigod*
author: 0x0f1C01d98AE190Ad2739a6075B21C2343d8b412e
